data.text: @HaiTankard @chenjingjianji1 @thehill Apparently your Chinese celebrities don't go to any other countries, since none of them have gotten COVID. 🙄

@chenjingjianji1 @ThomasHoufek @thehill In fact, most Australians and Americans are like this, which may be the reason for happy education。They always look at others with their arrogance and prejudice！
@HaiTankard @ThomasHoufek @thehill 他们多看看媒体。就以为了解了全世界。跟井底之蛙有什么区别？

@ThomasHoufek @chenjingjianji1 @thehill Forget it, you would rather believe the false news given to you by your media than the people living in China. I have traveled to eleven countries. I hope you can go abroad more, too。By the way, US is the master of AUS
@ThomasHoufek @HaiTankard @thehill Your knowledge is probably only as big as your media https://t.co/eMex9Kfakr a frog in a wellThe world it sees is only as big as the mouth of the well.
@chenjingjianji1 @HaiTankard @thehill Yes, and such, have no master.
@ThomasHoufek @HaiTankard @thehill Why don't you say your master is lying to you?You're American, right?🌚🌝
@ThomasHoufek @HaiTankard @thehill Because our people are United.There are also many stars in China who are popular abroad, but you don't know about them.
